name: Scavenger 2
overview: In this sequel to the original you once again find yourself dealing with the explosion at the space station Zenith X, which released its precious cargo: thousands of priceless gems into the cosmos.It is your job to scavenge as many of these gems as possible, but there's a catch. There's always a catch. All the gems are floating inside a huge asteroid storm, which is also inhabited by hostile aliens. It is up to you to fly across 20 different sectors, gathering as many gems as you can. Your commander will update you on how many gems are detected in each sector. This one has Scrolling, bosses, more weapons and stuff.
